Reviews:
Richard Cheah
Local Guide·170 reviews·723 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
One of the better spa & wellness you can find in the west.

Majority will be disappointed if you are looking for something more or special

Good thing is they do not show any discrimination if you only go for the basic $50/hour package.

My massage lady did her best to ensure i am overall happy with the services. Indeed, I am.

Armme Raine
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Sarah massage very good! It's so nice to be here ,the masseuse was so good that makes me feel really relaxed like all the pain i felt in my body was suddenly removed.high recommend !

William Leong
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
The ambient is good, a tranquil and relax feeling.  A Massage Therapist- Lily, which I have frequent quite a few times does have good massage skills. She will make you feel relax for the one or one and half session, depending on your request session period. You will definitely have a pleasurable experience with her massage therapist skills and before you know it, the session is up. Yup, definitely a good recommendation for her.

Adrian Cheng
Local Guide·62 reviews
Rated 1.0 out of 5,
Poor massage skills. Would never go again.

Aaron Chan
37 reviews·6 photos
Rated 1.0 out of 5,
This is undoubtedly the worst massage I ever go for in my life, which I regretted patronizing. I was requesting for full body aroma oil massage. However, the masseuse insisted that that for the price I am paying for would merely be normal massage. The overall massage session was neither relaxing or a pleasant one for me. Before and after the massage just makes no difference at all, my bodyache still persists and it doesn't alleviate any of the associated pain. Most of the time, she tried to utilise her cold-calling strategies to make me do unnecessarily expensive treatment as to profiteer, which I don't give a budge. And moreover the service attitude was extremely bad and below my satisfaction.This is one of the most costly lesson for me for such a substandard and ineffective massage. Once before but never again and I going. Hope potential patrons do take note.

Des Ong
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Hi guys, I was recommended to try out the service here. It didnt disappoint. I came in tired and came out refreshed. I was also recommended to try a masseur- Lily, which, she was the main reason, besides the smoothing ambient, that has refreshed me up. She is patient, know where to apply the right pressure, attractive and friendly. It was really a good experience compared to other places. I have become her regulator ever since visited her the first time few months ago. I am sharing this few months later because to see whether she maintain her consistency or not, and she didnt fail. A must try type. Enjoy your service guys😊

Cr1t Str1ke
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Call them and book for a masseuse.

If you dont book, you’ll get a not good masseuse.

Good masseuse: Ice, Star, Lavender.

Bad masseuse: Other than those 3.

Best would be Ice. 100/100.
Star 90/100
Lavender 80/100.
Others 50/100.

Book either those 3, or don’t go at all.
